result.name: plant-protection-product-information
result.notes:
A number of databases that hold details of information on around 7000 Plant Protection Products that have held an authorisation for use and those with On-Label authorisations since 1998.
For all extant products with a current authorisation the following data is available on-line: active substances contained, the marketing and approval holder, formulation type, field of use, crop or situations approved for use, whether approved for amateur or professional use, links to the notices of approval for each authorisation.
For each product the dataset holds some commercially sensitive data.  This is not made available on-line: formulation and related manufacturing details,any data requirements that have been set, packaging information
The information in the data set covers Great Britain.

organization.name: health-and-safety-executive
organization.title: Health and Safety Executive
organization.description:
The Health and Safety Executive (HSE) is the national independent watchdog for work-related health, safety and illness. It acts in the public interest to reduce work-related death and serious injury across Great Britain’s workplaces.

HSE is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.hse.gov.uk/
